title: Garen Bug - patch 5.14 - He can one shot Baron
body:
tested it 5 times. will post a video soon.

once you bring smite on Garen. buy a trinket at level 9, and upgrade it. sell the trinket, and buy it once more. repeat the process 3 times. then click undo, 3 times. run to lane, press E on gump, smite and drop the trinket on gump at the same time.

this will glitch smite, and you have a charge that does infinite damage. go to baron, and smite it, instant kill.

PROFIT.

win.

games.

do it before patched.
